item.title: Aligning Audio-Visual Joint Representations with an Agentic Workflow
item.description: AVAgent uses an LLM-driven workflow to intelligently align audio and visual data, resulting in improved AV joint representations and state-of-the-art performance on various downstream tasks.

item.title: Animate3D: Animating Any 3D Model with Multi-view Video Diffusion
item.description: Animate3D animates any 3D model using multi-view video diffusion, achieving superior spatiotemporal consistency and straightforward mesh animation.

item.title: SHMT: Self-supervised Hierarchical Makeup Transfer via Latent Diffusion Models
item.description: SHMT: Self-supervised Hierarchical Makeup Transfer uses latent diffusion models to realistically and precisely apply diverse makeup styles to faces, even without paired training data, achieving high f…
